author: John Semley, Josh Visser, Max Daly
title: You're Socially Isolating. Is Now a Good Time to Trip on Psychedelics?
description: The COVID-19 pandemic has left many people at home, alone. Psychedelics are one way to travel without going anywhere.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Borders are closed and planes are grounded, meaning you cant travel abroad. So why notyou ponder, as you eye a ziplock baggie of mushroom dust leftover from summer, or the four hits of blotter you keep in a ch… [+9334 chars]
